More work bound for PULSE MIAMI this December: This group of modest sized buoys are available individually, but intended as a complete set. The work will be on display in the Mark Moore Gallery Booth. Titles from left to right: Caution; Radio Boston; Proceed; Safe Water; Power Station ALL: 5″ x 7″, 2008, US Currency […]

Better Value Begins with Change

Posted on Sep 18, 2008 in Art Updates | No Comments

After scaling down the size (by request of the curator), the Mayor’s sign looks huge out of context.  “Better Value Begins with Change” is a simple bit of word play meant to allude to the absurdity of a universal value system, a two party electoral system representing 300 million people, and the intrinsic value of […]
